name: Maybelline Fit Me Foundation
description: Lightweight foundation that blends seamlessly and provides a natural matte finish.
details: This foundation offers buildable coverage with a breathable matte finish for normal to oily skin. Enriched with micro-powders, it controls shine and blurs pores for a flawless look.

reviews.comment: Perfect match for my skin tone! Blends seamlessly and stays matte all day.

name: L'Oréal Voluminous Mascara
description: Enhances lashes with intense volume and a smudge-proof formula.
details: Get dramatic volume with L'Oréal's clump-free mascara that lifts, lengthens, and stays all day without smudging or flaking.

reviews.comment: Gives amazing volume without clumping. My lashes look so much longer!

name: Lakmé Eyeconic Kajal
description: Long-lasting kajal for bold and dramatic eyes that lasts up to 22 hours.
details: Lakmé Eyeconic Kajal is smudge-proof and waterproof, giving you intense black color and comfort wear that lasts all day.

reviews.comment: Stays put all day! Perfect for my waterline and doesn't smudge.

name: MAC Matte Lipstick – Ruby Woo
description: Iconic red matte lipstick that delivers rich color and smooth application.
details: This retro matte lipstick from MAC features an intense red tone with a no-shine, all-matte texture that stays put.

reviews.comment: Iconic red shade! Perfect matte finish that lasts for hours.

name: Huda Beauty Nude Eyeshadow Palette
description: Versatile nude palette with matte, shimmer, and metallic finishes.
details: With richly pigmented shades, this eyeshadow palette lets you create endless nude looks for both day and night.

reviews.comment: Beautiful shades! The pigmentation is amazing and blends like a dream.

name: Colorbar Cheekillusion Blush
description: Soft, silky blush that adds a natural flush to your cheeks.
details: This lightweight, blendable blush gives you a youthful glow while nourishing your skin with antioxidants.

reviews.comment: Gives a natural flush to my cheeks. The color is buildable and lasts long.

name: Maybelline New York Instant Age Rewind Eraser Concealer
description: Conceal your dark circles and spots, and highlight your beautiful features.
details: This concealer erases fine lines, dark circles, and blemishes with a micro-corrector applicator and brightening formula.

reviews.comment: Great coverage for dark circles. The sponge applicator makes it easy to apply.

name: Insight Cosmetics Lip & Cheek Tint
description: Multipurpose tint that moisturizes lips, cheeks & eyes boldly with vitamin E.
details: This creamy tint glides smoothly and provides a natural flush while keeping your skin nourished and hydrated.

reviews.comment: Love the dual purpose! Gives a natural flush to both lips and cheeks.

name: HUDA GIRL BEAUTY 2in1 Korean Foundation & CC Cream
description: Waterproof, long-lasting foundation and CC cream with mushroom brush.
details: This innovative 2-in-1 product combines skincare and makeup benefits, offering hydration and flawless coverage with a unique sponge applicator.

reviews.comment: Love the dual purpose! Gives a natural flush to both lips and cheeks.
